Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I have been playing KSP in my spare time for quite some time now (though I don't really have that much time as a grad student).

I have an affinity for math and programming so I have begun combining those interests to create Kerminal: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93469-WIP-Kerminal-Terminal-Interface-to-KSP-via-Telemachus

Hopefully I'll be able to give some back to the KSP Community which has already given me so much fun.

Happy Kerballing.

Welcome to the forums!

You may want to take a look at kOS (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47399-kOS-Scriptable-Autopilot-System-0-9), it's an interesting autopilot system that I think ties in with Telemachus well.
That is a great suggestion. I am glad to see the progress that project has made. I'll look into it!

Although not a graduate student (I am a recovering post-graduate student with degrees and student loans to prove it!), teaching college does take a lot of time outside the classroom. I've been a member of the forum since November 2013 but didn't become active in posting until a little while ago.

I, too am looking forward to giving back to the community - eventually.
Hi Savina hope for you fun time here
